text.section: In this subtitle the following terms have the meanings indicated.

"Court" means a court of law or a court of equity and includes the United States District Court for the District of Maryland, the United States Bankruptcy Court for the District of Maryland, the Court of Appeals, the Court of Special Appeals, and the District Court of Maryland.

section.section: "Money judgment" means a judgment determining that a specified amount of money is immediately payable to the judgment creditor.
"Money judgment" does not include a judgment mandating the payment of money.
